statements: UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET is_verified = true WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET password = 'newPassword123' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET username = 'newUsername', is_verified = true WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
UPDATE users SET phone_number = '+1234567890', multi_factor_authentication = TRUE, password = 'newpassword' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_logs SET logout_time = now() WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET phone_number = '+1-555-123-4567', multi_factor_authentication = true WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_logs SET logout_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, login_time = '2022-07-25 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET username='johndoe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE mfa_methods SET method_type='SMS', is_verified=true WHERE user_id='98765432-12d3-a456-4266-1417400000';
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE sessions SET logout_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND session_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET password = 'newPassword123' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE user_sessions SET logout_time = NOW() WHERE session_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4hij-8klm-9nopq0rstuvw';
UPDATE users SET password = 'new_secure_password' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_sessions SET logout_time = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE session_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE devices SET device_name = 'New Device' WHERE user_id = 5;
